Bash(python -c "import subprocess; result = subprocess.run\([''pip'', ''show'', ''cohere''], capture_output=True, text=True\); print\(''Cohere size info:'' + result.stdout if result.returncode == 0 else ''Cohere not installed''\)")

Bash(python -c "import os, pkg_resources; print\(''Package sizes in site-packages:''\); packages = [\(''cohere'', ''cohere''\), \(''qdrant-client'', ''qdrant_client''\), \(''fastapi'', ''fastapi''\), \(''uvicorn'', ''uvicorn''\)]; total_size = 0; for pkg, name in packages: size = sum\(os.path.getsize\(os.path.join\(root, file\)\) for root, dirs, files in os.walk\(pkg_resources.get_distribution\(name\).location\) for file in files\); print\(f''{pkg}: {size / \(1024*1024\):.2f} MB''\); total_size += size; print\(f''Total checked packages: {total_size / \(1024*1024\):.2f} MB''\)")
